data.description:
Ever wanted to embark on an epic adventure and become a space ranger? YUKI is here for you, in VR and MR!

You’ll face perils in deep space and your only companions throughout this journey are POD, your sidekick, and your own skill while playing. Dodge and defeat countless waves of projectiles and enemies while you get better and better with power-ups and charms to help you out.

- Procedural generated levels: Every run is a whole new challenge
- Multiple power-ups: Customize your gameplay according to your own strategy
- Get XP to upgrade your character’s charms and build the strongest ranger the space has ever seen!
- Endless Mode with GLOBAL LEADERBOARD: Compete globally to see who is the most skillful player in this frenetic shooter
- MR Mode: Transform your living room into the battlefield! In this new 360 mode, enemies come from EVERYWHERE! Front, back, both sides and even above you! You must be quick on the draw for this one!
- Story mode with gorgeous scenarios, edgy bosses, a superb soundtrack, and much much more!

changelog.change_log:
ENDLESS MODE IS HERE!
FREE UPDATE

New Features:
- New game mode: ENDLESS MODE. Face infinite runs with a constantly increasing challenge, where the goal is to achieve the highest score by overcoming endless hordes of enemies.
- Global Leaderboards: Challenge yourself and your friends to see who gets the best score!

It's time for some endless fun!

ENDLESS MODE IS HERE!
FREE UPDATE

New Features:

- New game mode: ENDLESS MODE. Face infinite runs with a constantly increasing challenge, where the goal is to achieve the highest score by overcoming endless hordes of enemies.
- Global Leaderboards: Challenge yourself and your friends to see who gets the best score!

It's time for some endless fun!
- Fixed an issue in Tormentor Bells
